Name: Restart the radar
Description: The Jinzhou military wants to restart the radar at Desorock Highland, but the engineer in charge has yet to show up...
QuestDesc: The Jinzhou military wants to restart the radar at Desorock Highland, but the engineer in charge has yet to show up...

Dialogues.Speaker: Upset Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You there, kind {Male=sir;Female=miss}. Please, I’m in dire need of assistance...

Dialogues.Speaker: Upset Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *sigh* The Tacet Discords busted our radars again...

Dialogues.Speaker: Upset Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don’t know what’s got into them lately. It’s like they’re on a rampage. We’ve lost count how many times the radars’ gotten totaled...

Dialogues.Speaker: Upset Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fix, smashed, fix, smashed. Rinse and repeat... With our brothers going out like flies, even the engineers hightailed it. When is this ever going to end...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My squadmates. Ah... excuse me. Forgot to introduce myself. I’m Hé Chou, <ano=Rearguard>Midnight Rangers</ano>. I’m from the unit stationed in this area.

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With all the mess the TDs have been giving us, everyone’s... ran off left, right, and center.

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And now I’m the only one that’s left... plain old useless me... with nothing I can do...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: An engineer was supposed to report in for duty today, but he hasn’t even shown up yet...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh. It’s my last assignment, too. I can’t screw this up...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just my luck. How did I get myself into this mess?

Options.PlotLineKey: Want me to help you find him?
You’ll end up in a deeper mess if you don’t chin-up...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All right, all right... Guess it’s the only thing I can do for now...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, it can’t get any worse than this...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But you’re right... There are TDs running wild all over the place as it is... Can’t have my bad luck passing on to others...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All right, all right... Guess it’s the only thing I can do for now...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way. I haven’t caught your name...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}... Got it. I’ll keep that in mind.

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Also, once my shift’s over, remind me to get you a good luck charm to make up for all this jumble.

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Tacet Discords over there surrounding the sentry tower...? Kind of strange...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Ah! There's a man trapped in the sentry tower! Let's eliminate those Tacet Discords and get him down!

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You still in one piece?

Dialogues.Speaker: Survivior
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’m okay. Thank goodness you guys came in time. Almost thought I was a goner!

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phew... Good to hear. Can’t have any more people get hurt. Not on my watch...

Dialogues.Speaker: Survivior
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait a sec... Your uniform. You're a Midnight Ranger? And who may this be...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, the name’s Hé Chou. Rearguard, Midnight Rangers. And this is {PlayerName}, a friend who’s got quite a few fighting skills under {Male=hs;Female=her} sleeves it seems like.

Dialogues.Speaker: Survivior
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahh. Greetings. I’m Qiuwang. Engineer. I received orders from the Defense Division to report my new assignment. I have been briefed on the recent incidents regarding this area. Thank you for your hard work thus far.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuwang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yet, regardless of how difficult the situation may be, we cannot put aside our tasks. Without further delay, let’s head to the surveillance station.

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You... You do realize you were just attacked by TDs, right? Aren't you afraid? You sure you don’t want to rest up a bit?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuwang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’m a bit frightened, yes. But rest won’t be necessary.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuwang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The risk of danger increases each minute the radar isn’t operational. As I was entrusted with this task, I am obligated to fulfill these duties.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuwang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides, there is something I wish to pursue...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The way you put it reminds of the old me who volunteered to come to the Desorock Highland.

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I used to be full of ambition and eagerness to try out something new...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But after you get beaten down over and over again, those close to you disappear one after another...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And all you can do is just watch... standing there helplessly...

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’ll see if you can still keep that enthusiasm and high spirit of yours when the time comes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuwang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When the time... Well, only time will tell!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuwang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All I know is that there is a task at hand, and repairs must be done at the surveillance station.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuwang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Cell seems to be intact on the exterior. The only way to find out if it’s still functional is by going back to the surveillance station.

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We should shake a leg then... The quicker we get it fixed up, the sooner I can say goodbye to this shift...

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuwang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As I anticipated, there are also signs of structural collapse in this station... Likely caused by battle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuwang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Judging from these markings, the significance of the amount of force exterted that led to this destruction cannot be underestimated.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuwang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fortunately, it seems that the surrounding area is still safe for the time being... We should break the debris and get inside quickly.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuwang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let’s hope this thing’s still working.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qiuwang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahh. The Cell is right there in front of us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Hé Chou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This should be the last one, right...? Finally, I wrap this up now...
